Video Caption: CLOSING THE 2018 WINTER OLYMPICS | The Martin Garrix Show S4.E17
Comment: Closing the 2018 Winter Olympics Ceremony in South Korea! This was such a special experience for me and I’m glad I can share it with you after 2 years! ❤️ New music this Thursday!
